title: Is the proposal for relocation of an existing industry? If so, give the name and address of the existing industry
clause_text: Is the proposal for relocation of an existing industry? If so, give the name and address of the existing industry. Note. - The permission will be based on the area which is minimum.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Is the proposal for relocation of an existing industry? If so, give the name and address of the existing industry.
